name: 247 Fixers ®
tag_list: computer-support, computer-repair-service, virus-removal, 247-fixers, 8009875471, technical-support, laptop-support, buy-laptop, buy-computer-hardware, virus-issue, technology
overview:
247 Fixers is a leading provider of online technical support services to consumers and small businesses across a wide range of computing and communications devices and software . With our presence in the United States, Australia, United Kingdom & Canada we deliver support services to millions of customers globally and our services are available on a 24/7 basis, 365 days a year.

Powered with a team of eminent Certified Engineers, 247 Fixers is endeavored to the best of online tech-support service and make a hold on its targeted clientele by making its service a quality offering. The array of online/on-call or chat support provided by 247 Fixers ensures a remote assistance, which protects your computer accurately and efficiently, irrespective of the size of the issue and your location. We provide technical support and software services which can be delivered remotely.

The wide range of service offerings by 247 Fixers is brand-agnostic, which makes it a “sure thing” for many customers’ technology support needs. Customers can rely on 247 Fixers to address many of their technical support needs and avoid the complexities of working with multiple support providers associated with each individual device or software application they purchase.

Even the most intricate technical issues are given due consideration including diagnosis, repair, virus removal, PC optimization, installation and other services including maintenance services for multiple devices, software applications and other products. Customer satisfaction is our motto and ensuring ethical, cultural and professional values is our forte! Connect to 247 Fixers, the real McCoy of technical assistance and for constant connectivity to eradicate your digital disasters.
